diagnostics.value: error: Element '{http://hl7.org/fhir}code', attribute 'value': [facet 'enumeration'] The value 'BEI' is not an element of the set {'GKV', 'PKV', 'BG', 'SEL', 'SKT', 'UK'}.; Bundle.entry[3].resource{Patient}.identifier[0].assigner: error: missing mandatory element (from profile: https://fhir.kbv.de/StructureDefinition/KBV_PR_FOR_Patient:versichertennummer_pkv|1.0.3); Bundle.entry[3].resource{Patient}.identifier[0].assigner: error: missing mandatory element (from profile: http://fhir.de/StructureDefinition/identifier-pkv|0.9.13); Bundle.entry[5].resource{Coverage}.type: error: Code BEI with system http://fhir.de/CodeSystem/versicherungsart-de-basis not allowed for ValueSet binding, allowed are [http://fhir.de/CodeSystem/versicherungsart-de-basis]BG, [http://fhir.de/CodeSystem/versicherungsart-de-basis]GKV, [http://fhir.de/CodeSystem/versicherungsart-de-basis]PKV, [http://fhir.de/CodeSystem/versicherungsart-de-basis]SEL, [https://fhir.kbv.de/CodeSystem/KBV_CS_FOR_Payor_Type_KBV]SKT, [https://fhir.kbv.de/CodeSystem/KBV_CS_FOR_Payor_Type_KBV]UK (from profile: https://fhir.kbv.de/StructureDefinition/KBV_PR_FOR_Coverage|1.0.3);
